import React, { useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' export default function CreateProject() { const [project, setProject] = useState({ title: '', content: '', date: '' }) const history= useHistory() const onChangeInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setProject({...project,[name]:value}) } return (
